name: telnyx-wdio-tests
description: WebdriverIO tests for Telnyx Voice AI

scripts.test:firefox: echo '⚠️  Firefox: Рекомендується Docker для стабільних тестів' && wdio run wdio.firefox.conf.js
scripts.docker:up: docker-compose up -d selenium-hub chrome firefox edge && echo '✅ Selenium Grid запущено! Grid Console: http://localhost:4444'
scripts.docker:clean: docker-compose down -v && docker rmi telnyx-tests 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.docker:rebuild: npm run docker:clean && docker-compose build && npm run docker:run
